summary:
6 save games for the 5 player character from Golden Axe 1, 2 and 3 + the mighty Death Adder. Saves all start inside Helgen Keep with Hadvar.

UPDATE: Death Adder save added.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=\'4\']The Legacy of Golden Axe
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]


This mod adds 6 save files for the 5 player characters from the Golden Axe 1, 2, 3. Plus the mighty Death Adder!!!

[b]Introduction:[/b] The evil Death Adder has risen from the dead and has began to rise to power. Using an ancient ritual, he has thwarted the only Heros with the skill and power to stop him. Transporting his old enemies into another land. This is their story:


[b]Optional File:[/b] 6 Batch files i used to create the characters and to try and keep them balanced with each other. Called \"Ax\", \"Gilius\", \"Tyris\", \"Chronos\", \"Proud\" and \"DeathAdder\" 

[b]Optional File:[/b] Custom Re-textures of Tsun, Iron, Forsworn and Ancient Nord Armor.

I\'ve tried my best to keep them to the original Style and look of the games while using the resources available in Skyrim. however, as an optional file i have included the 6 batch files i used to create them. Feel free to change the aesthetics if my attempts are not to your liking. The batch files remove (almost all) of the racial bonuses and re-adjust starting skills. (Base level for skills is 15, each race then adds a combined 35 onto this)

Death Adder is the exception to this. I just went wild. But he is the end boss so i think it\'s justified.

Should you find the characters [b]TOO[/b] powerful, use the console command below to increase your character level (by ONE) without any of the associated perks or health/stamina/magicka gains. This will effectively increase the level of all enemies met while leaving you the same.

[center][size=\"3\"][b]player.advlevel[/b][/size][/center]


[b]Usage:[/b] Unzip saves and place in your C:\\Documents and Settings\\<USERNAME>\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves. Load the game and a save. Enjoy.

[b]Usage of Optional File:[/b] Unzip files and place in your C:\\steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim folder. In-game, open the console and type [b]bat NAME[/b] where NAME is the first name of the character.

[b]Required Mods:[/b]
[url=3556]\"True Barbarian Armor\"[/url] by rahman530 (Iron Armor Replacer version)
[url=2822]\"Prometheus Capes\"[/url] by Prometheus (Amulet version)

[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]
[url=3320]\"Skimpy and Super Skimpy Forsworn Armor Using CBBE\"[/url] by Killer Keo   -   (skimpy version works best for Tyris)
[url=2666]\"Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-\"[/url] by Calient   -   (because Tyris is a curvaceous woman)
[url=562]\"No Helmet Mod\"[/url] by vuradic   -   (because it\'s awesome, why spend all that time working on your face, only to cover it with a helmet?)
[url=563]\"Athletic Nude Women - CBBE\"[/url] by Valstein0   -   (Because Tyris is an athletic, fighting woman. Not some soft mage)
[url=4145]\"More Muscular Men texture normals\"[/url] by tigersan-wolverinehowlett (because i felt the men were lacking definition in their torso)
[url=3265]\"Increased character height\"[/url] by Kacemus (use height 1.10 for Ax Battler, 1.4 for Death Adder and Proud Cragger)



[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Ax Battler
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 140, [b]Stamina[/b] 340, [b]Magicka[/b] 270

[b]Height:[/b] 1.09

[b]Armor:[/b] Tsun\'s Armor, Scales Bracers, Scaled Boots, Amulet of Kynareth, Silver and Sapphire Circlet

[b]Weapon:[/b] Nord Hero Greatsword

[b]Skills:[/b] Light armor +18, Two-Handed +9, Destruction +9

[b]Powers:[/b] Frost Resistance, Histskin

[b]Spells:[/b] Frostbite, Ice Spike, Frost Rune, Frost Cloak, Ice Storm, Icy Spear,  Flames (cannot remove), Healing (cannot remove)

[b]Perks:[/b] Novice [b]-->[/b] Adept Destruction, Deep Freeze, Agile Defender (lvl 2), Unhindered, Barbarian (lvl 3), Champion\'s Stance, Deep Wounds (lvl 2), Great Critical Charge, Avoid Death

[b]Description:[/b] A brown-haired muscular hero, who uses a large broadsword while wearing skimpy armor. Ax\'s mother is murdered by Death Adder\'s forces and this is his motive in the original Golden Axe. His magic is Ice based.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Tyris Flare
=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 85, [b]Stamina[/b] 85, [b]Magicka[/b] 580

[b]Height:[/b] 0.98

[b]Armor:[/b] Forsworn Armor, Forsworn Boots, Forsworn Gauntlets, Amulet of Akatosh, Copper and Ruby Circlet

[b]Weapon:[/b] Nord Hero Sword

[b]Skills:[/b] Destruction +18, Light Armor +12, One-handed +6

[b]Powers:[/b] Fire Resistance, Highborn

[b]Spells:[/b] Flames, Firebolt, Fire Rune, Fire Cloak, Fireball, Wall of Flames, Incinerate, Fire Storm, Healing (cannot remove)

[b]Perks:[/b] Novice [b]-->[/b] Master Destruction, Intense Flames, Atronach, Agile Defender, Unhindered, Armsman, Fighting Stance, Avoid Death

[b]Description:[/b] A red-haired amazon who wields a sword while wearing revealing armor. Both her parents are murdered by Death Adder\'s forces, leading her to seek revenge in the first Golden Axe game. Her magic attacks are all fire based and very powerful.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Gilius Thunderhead
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 130, [b]Stamina[/b] 480, [b]Magicka[/b] 140

[b]Height:[/b] 0.88

[b]Armor:[/b] Ancient Nord Helm, Ancient Nord Armor, Ancient Nord Gauntlets, Ancient Nord Boots, Amulet of Arkay

[b]Weapon:[/b] Skyforged Steel Battleaxe

[b]Skills:[/b] Two-Handed +18, Heavy Armor +12, Destruction +6

[b]Powers:[/b] Resist Disease, Resist Poison, Adrenaline Rush

[b]Spells:[/b] Sparks, Lightning Rune, Lightning Bolt, Flames (cannot remove), Healing (cannot remove)

[b]Perks:[/b] Novice Destruction, Apprentice Destruction, Disintegrate, Juggernaut (lvl 3), Conditioning, Barbarian (lvl 4), Limbsplitter (lvl 3), Devastating Blow, Avoid Death

[b]Description:[/b] A white-haired, white-bearded dwarf with a horned helmet and heavy armor. He seeks revenge in the Golden Axe after his brother is murdered by Death Adder\'s forces and returns again to defeat Dark Guild in Golden Axe II. His magic is Lightning based and the weakest of the three original characters.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Chronos \"Evil\" Lait
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 100, [b]Stamina[/b] 630, [b]Magicka[/b] 20

[b]Height:[/b] 1.00

[b]Armor:[/b] Hide armor, Hide Boots, Enchanted Iron Gauntlets (Fort. unarmed), Amulet of Arkay

[b]Weapon:[/b] Bow, Unarmed

[b]Skills:[/b] Sneak +18, Archery +12, Light Armor +6

[b]Powers:[/b] Claws, Poison Resistance, Adrenaline Rush, Night Eye, Embrace of Shadows, Command Animal

[b]Spells:[/b] Flames (cannot remove), Healing (cannot remove)

[b]Perks:[/b] Unhindered, Fists of Steel, Stealth (lvl 3), Light foot, Muffled, Silence, Silent Casting, Archer (lvl 2), Eagle Eye, Critical Shot, Hunter\'s Discipline, Ranger, Avoid Death

[b]Description:[/b] Added as a character in Golden Axe 3, He has no magic. But excels in stealth and hunting with a Bow. And has a vicious claw attack.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Proud Cragger
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 250, [b]Stamina[/b] 480, [b]Magicka[/b] 20

[b]Height: [/b] 1.45

[b]Armor:[/b] Fur armor,  Prisoner\'s Cuffs, Amulet of Kynareth, Foot Wraps,

[b]Weapon:[/b] Steel Warhammer

[b]Skills.[/b] Two-Handed +24, Light Armor +12

[b]Powers:[/b] Battle Cry, Berzerk Rage, Histskin, Adrenaline Rush, Resistance to Magic, Reduced Shout Recovery Time (50%)

[b]Spells:[/b] Flames (cannot remove), Healing (cannot remove)

[b]Perks:[/b] Magic Resistance (lvl 3), Agile Defender (lvl 3), Unhindered, Barbarian (lvl 4), Champion\'s Stance, Skullcrusher (lvl 3), Intimidate, Avoid Death

[b]Description:[/b] Slow but powerful. He has no magic but is highly proficient with blunt two-handed weapons, has resistance to magic and has reduced shout recovery.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\']Death Adder
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/size][/b][/center]

[b]Health[/b] 400, [b]Stamina[/b] 600, [b]Magicka[/b] 700

[b]Height:[/b] 1.6

[b]Armor:[/b] Iron Armor, Iron Boots, Iron Gauntlets, Dragonplate Helmet, Amulet of Talos

[b]Weapon & Shield:[/b] The Golden Axe (Enchanted Legendary War Axe). Red Fang\'s Memory (Enchanted Shield)

[b]Skills.[/b] One-Handed +24, Heavy Armor +18, Conjuration +18, Destruction +18, Block +18

[b]Powers:[/b] Histskin, Adrenaline Rush, Highborn, Resistance to Magic,

[b]Spells:[/b] Flames (cannot remove), Healing (cannot remove), Incinerate, Wall of Frost, Lightning Storm, Dead Thrall, Command Daedra, Raise Zombie, Reanimate Corpse, Revnant, Conjure Dread Zombie,

[b]Perks:[/b] Magic Resistance (lvl 3), Juggernaut (lvl 4), Conditioning, Armsman (lvl 4), Fighting Stance, Savage Strike, Hack and Slash (lvl 3), Intimidate, Shield Wall (lv4), Elemental Protection, Power Bash, Deadly Bash, Block Runner, Shield Charge, Expert Destruction, Master Destruction, Intense Flames, Deep Freeze, Disintegrate, Novice --> Master Conjuration, Twin Souls, Necromancy, Dark Souls, Conjuration Duel Casting, Necromage

[b]Other:[/b] Save starts with 2 Stormcloak Dead Thralls in service.

[b]Description:[/b] A fearsome giant, Death Adder seeks nothing but to conquer all lands of Yuria. By using the power of the legendary Golden Axe, He imprisoned the king and his daughter, unleashing his horde of minions to enslave all people from Yuria, making him their evil ruler. Many villages were pillaged and all who opposed him were slain in cold-blood. Three heroes put an end to Death Adder\'s evil reign. They were Ax, Tyris, and Gillius. Together, they traveled the lands of Yuria, fighting Death Adder\'s minions. They invaded Death Adder\'s castle, where they face the giant in battle. Death Adder was defeated, and many believed he was dead.

Years later, when people was living at peace again, Death Adder emerged from the darkness, along with his castle, spreading chaos and destruction again. This time, Death Adder wanted revenge. Four new heroes stood against his forces, fighting their way after the evil giant. They invade his castle by flying in the back of a dragon, and face Death Adder, defeating him again. However, as they were fleeing the crumbling castle in the dragon, Death Adder ambushes them, in an attempt to kill all of them at once. Gillius, who was along with them, uses the Golden Axe and hits Death Adder in the head, but they both fall from the dragon. Gillius and Death Adder were both believed dead, and the Golden Axe Lost.

But he has risen again...

Death Adder is a master Necromancer, able to raise powerful beings from the dead and enslave them into his power. His size and strength makes him a powerful adversary in armed combat. and his offensive magical abilities are limited although very powerful.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b]



[b][size=\'3\'] Author\'s Note [/size][/b]
[b][size=\'3\'] =-=-=-=-=-=-=-= [/size][/b][/center]

I\'ve tried to make it so that everyone in balanced (compared to each other, not against a lvl 1 character) To that end:

Gilius has lots of stamina, decent health and poor magic. His perks are done so that he relies on his axe for damage and gets the best overall protection from his heavy armor.

Tyris has poor health and stamina, but great magical abilities and a little protection from her armor and weak damage from her sword.

Ax, as always, is somewhere between them both. high-ish health (he\'s a big man), average stamina, average weapon damage, average magic and magicka, average armor protection.

Chronos had to be changed a bit from his appearance in Golden Axe 3. His claws should do decent damage and i gave him stealth abilities because panthers are stealth hunters. I also gave him archery for long range damage and very high stamina so he can sprint for extended periods of time.

Proud, being a giant, has high health and high damage output with his hammer. I would have given him the weapon \'giants club\' but the weapons scale with the characters and it just looked stupidly large. But if anyone knows of a crude looking club, let me know. I also reduced his shout recovery time to give him something akin to a range attack.

Death Adder is another story all together. he is the largest by far. Does good damage with his axe, has a few powerful spells (think Death Bringer from the Genisis/MegaDrive port). He also has all the undead conjuring spells (since Golden Axe games have quite a few skeleton warriors in it, i figure it must be Death Adder raising them from the grave). I also took it a step further and killed the first 2 Stormcloaks you meet and raised them as Dead Thralls. He can\'t summon Daedra though. Necromancy only. However, his evil power does allow him to control Daedra. Plus he is the only save that doesn\'t have an \'extra life\' (Avoid Death perk). The 5 other characters do. And no-one should be hindered by armor since they all have the relevent perk in Light or Heavy Armor.


[center][b]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[/b][/center]
